{"name": "Mount Olive Baptist Church Hackensack", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- The food pantry is next door to the church 
- The Friday schedule is dependant on the truck deliveries which might not be made and therefore means the pantry is closed.
-Summer Meal Program/ Coordinator: Gerri	Craig	2014907795 Start:	06/30/2025	End: 08/22/2025
", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "260 Central Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Hackensack", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07601", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8895406, "longitude": -74.051846}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 489-6888", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "State ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
